knit this is a fun exploration of fair isle on a hat **crochet hook ** 5 0 mm h furls hook 1 **notions ** yarn needle scissors stitch marker **yarn ** wecrochet kindred 2 in colorways -golden rod -ink **yardage ** baby 75yds 69 m toddler 100yds 92 m child 125yds 114 m adult 145yds 133 m xl adult 160yds 146 m **abbreviations/stitches ** blo- back loop only chain- chain st- stitch slip_stitch- slip_stitch ssc- split single_crochet ssc2tog- split single_crochet 2 together **gauge** 4 x 4 inch swatch in ssc= 16 single_crochet stitches x 20 row **measurements/sizes ** baby toddler child adult & xl adult schematic in notes **skill level ** intermediate **the pattern on the blog ** the free version of this pattern supported by advertisements can be found on my blog at http //www
